briefTitle: Comparative Study of Hexvix Blue Light Cystoscopy and White Light Cystoscopy in the Detection of Bladder Cancer
officialTitle: A Prospective, Comparative Within Patient Controlled, Multi-center Study of Hexvix Blue Light Cystoscopy and White Light Cystoscopy in the Detection of Bladder Cancer

interventions.name: Richard Wolf Photodynamic Diagnostic Equipment (PDD) system

summary: A study to compare Hexvix Blue light cstoscopy with standard White light cystoscopy in the detection of bladder cancer.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Patients With Histology-confirmed Lesions (Ta, T1, or CIS) Who Have at Least One Such Lesion Found by Hexvix Blue Light Cystoscopy But Not by White Light Cystoscopy.
